text_block_list.text: After that race, I'd signed up Nice Nature, and we began training in earnest.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeeeowww! My muscles are like jelly already. I guess with a real trainer, you get real training, huh.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna be sore in the morning! Alright. What's next?
She didn't strike me as the enthusiastic type when we'd first met, but once we got down to it, Nice Nature was serious and diligent about her training.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What? Something the matter, Trainer-san?
choice_data_list: Not at all. You're a good student!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: What!? No, well, I mean… I'll do what needs doing, you know? This is Tracen academy, after all.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyway, enough fooling around. C'mon, I said what's next?
She trained hard in the run-up to the next practice race. But…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff…!! … Haaa―

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Third place, huh…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: My own personal trainer… all that work… and that's all I've got, huh…
choice_data_list: You were so close that time, though!
You were so close that time, though!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A-hahaha… nah. I don't know… maybe third place is as good as it gets for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'm not going to stand here saying stuff like "The Twinkle Series is mine for the taking!", "Second is just the first loser!"… you know?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, come on now, Trainer-san, there's no need for that. It's like I told you: nature just didn't give me a whole lot to work with.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Don't get me wrong. I'll do my training, and you can be sure I won't hold anything back on race day.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But nobody knows me better than I do. What I can do… what I can't…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyway. I think that's enough of that. Are we done for the day, or…?
(Grrrr)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Mmm…? Trainer-san, was that… you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hehe, relax. Strapping young man like you needs to eat, right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Tell you what, why don't you come with me? I know somewhere real nice!
Before I could point out that I was, in fact, quite a few years older than her, she'd dragged me off to…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Mmmm, that smells good! Evenin', gramps! You got any of those nice chicken sticks?

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood yakitori guy
text_block_list.text: Oh, Nay-chan! I sure do! Got some nice gizzard fresh off the grill too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ooh, don't mind if I do…! Ah, wait. We're not here for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san here needs a little something. You couldn't put him together a wee selection of whatever's good today, could you?

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood yakitori guy
text_block_list.text: Comin' right up…! W… wait, WHAT!? You've got your own trainer!? That who you are, son?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh. Whoops.

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood yakitori guy
text_block_list.text: This is amazing! W… wait here, trainer-san! Every shop in the street will have something for you when they hear about this!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A-aaah! There's no need to make… a… ahh. He's pretty fast for an old guy. Maybe I should let him run some of my races for me…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: See, this is why I was trying not to tell anyone. Little late for that now, though.
choice_data_list: The locals really love you here, don't they?
The locals really love you here, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh, I don't know about "love", exactly. But it's like… even though I go to the fancy academy with all the famous horse girls, they can just come up and say "hi" to me in the street like it's no big deal.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You know, I actually grew up on a street just like this one. My Mom ran a little bar, and I used to help her out ever since I was small.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So I spent a lot of time talking to all the old regulars… the neighbors at the other stores…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: So you might say my upbringing was a little unusual. Maybe that's why I ended up, y'know… like this.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Anyway, that meant I could make a lot of friends down here, so I can't complain.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Talking about it brings back memories. Like that old lady from the sweet shop across the street… I wonder how her back's doing these days…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: She looks kind of scary but she she's actually a real sweetheart. She always made sure I got the sweets with prizes in 'em!
choice_data_list: They love you back home too, huh.
They love you back home too, huh.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ehehe… it's like I keep telling you, I'm not that special. Really.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But the folks back home, they did everything they could for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Just because I was a little faster than the other girls, everyone always came out to cheer me on… and before I knew it, I ended up here!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You should have seen the send-off they gave me. They hung flags and bunting up all over town… anyone would think it was some kind of festival.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And I'm sure everyone back home is expecting me to win a lot of big races, bring home a lot of trophies, but…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It just hasn't quite worked out like that.

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood yakitori guy
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, trainer-san! Here, take this. Don't be shy, fill your boots! And you look after Nay-chan for us, you hear!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You heard the man! You'd better eat up before it gets cold!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ah! There you are! Heeey! Nature! Aah! I've been looking all over for you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh? Teio? What's the big hurry?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: They posted the start lists for the big race meeting. You didn't see yet?

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood man
text_block_list.text: You talking about Tracen academy's famous semiannual race competition? When they let the public come and watch? I can hardly wait!

text_block_list.name: Neighborhood man
text_block_list.text: And you'd better believe everyone here is going to come out and cheer you on, Nay-chan!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: A-haha… thank you! So… they decided the groups already?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: But… why did you come all the way down here just to tell me that…?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You put your name down for the 2000m turf race, right? Well, so did I!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And we're in the same group! So I'm laying it on the line right here, right now!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Me against you at the big race! Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh… we're going to… race…!?
